participant_1.background:
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
i love non gmo foods.
i would like to try sky diving.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.

participant_2.background:
I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
i live on a lake.
i want to be an astronaut when i grow up.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

content.text: I love fantasy fiction books, and I want to teach kids in elementary school.  What about you?
I love Renaissance faires and I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.
That's awesome! I love the outdoors, I wish I could live on a lake like you.
I love being near the water. I have more space for my family and our movie collection in the suburbs.
I like the suburbs too, I have a lot of feelings and I like to write them down in my journal.
I'm glad that you have a creative outlet. I try to keep my clothes clean, but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
I wish I could go to a Renaissance Faire. I like trying new things, I would love to try skydiving.
I'm not sure I'm brave enough to try skydiving, but I admire your courage. I'm glad that you're following your dreams.
Thanks, I'm glad that you're passionate about your dreams too.
